text: @RepAdamSchiff @RepStephMurphy @BennieGThompson Schiff needs to be held accountable because he failed as the House intelligence chairman. He put impeachment ahead of coronavirus, and didn't do a briefing on coronavirus until his  partisan impeachment for political gain had failed. Resign, now!
